text: haey trong chea anak chabphdaem bangkeut mnoussaalok banteabmk trong nung bangkeut vea sachathmei mdongtiet( now thngai barlok) haey vea ngeay sruol bamphot samreab trong . haey champoh trong kuchea koumrou da utdongk utdam teang now leumekh cheachraen chean ning phendei . haey trong chea mcheasa mha khlangpouke mha ktebandet
